Adélaïde Grimaud

Hi there !

I'm Adélaïde Grimaud, a hybrid between a mechanical engineer and a computer scientist specialized in 3D interactive technologies.

I have recently obtained a M.Eng. in mechanical engineering at Ecole Nationale Supérieure d'Arts et Métiers and a M.Sc. in digital engineering at the Institut Image. Currently, I'm working in a research lab of the Brigham and Women's Hospital in Boston.

I'm also applying to Ph.D. programs!
